name: IM Action
tagline: Professional online marketing agency - SEO & SEM
description:
IM Action is a professional digital marketing agency. We employ boutique approach to provide highly personalized online marketing services to our valued clients.
We believe that great projects are driven by great people and make sure each of our clients has a perfectly balanced project team. 
From onboarding to setup and to daily execution tasks, we focus on data when making project decisions. We've built a strong reporting ecosystem to keep everyone on both clients' and our teams informed and aware how we perform, what we do and where we are heading to.
Being a Google Premier Partner, we are used to working in competitive and highly demaning niches and are ready for new challenges!
